questions.title: What the F**k?
questions.author: Sak Noel
questions.subject: Party People
questions.body: When I first came to Spain, and I saw people partying, I thought to myself 'what the f**k?'

answers.title: I'm a nini, ma!
answers.author: Erin
answers.body: Do you know what a nini is? Don't wait for me awake. I'm coming home late.
